about: Example YAML entry for someone wishing to add one to the DB.
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

```
- appid: cx16chess
  name: CX16 Chess
  description: "Chess game for the Commander X16"
  author:
    - name: "Irmen de Jong"
  license: ""                      # optional, can be blank or e.g. "MIT"
  status: "active"                 # active | abandoned
  platforms: ["any"]               # x16 | x16gs | otterx | emulator | any (X16-family wide)
  urls:
    source: "https://github.com/irmen/cx16chess"
```
